description:
The story revolves around a mature prisoner who was released on good behavior during Japan's Shouwa Genroku era (1960s to early 1970s). He is called Yotarou by others, a term that means an "anti-hero" or a "dim-witted man." When he returns to society, he starts a new life in rakugo (comic storytelling). Touched by Yakumo's role as the "grim reaper," he asks the master to take him in as an apprentice. Most of the season delves into Yakumo's own past during World War II and the years afterward.

(Source: Anime News Network)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of 48 minutes as opposed to the standard 24 minute long episode.
synonyms: Descending Stories: Showa Genroku Rakugo Shinju

tags.name: Rakugo
tags.description: Rakugo is the traditional Japanese performance art of comic storytelling.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Elderly Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist is either over 60 years of age, has an elderly appearance, or, in the case of non-humans, is considered elderly for their species.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

title.native: 昭和元禄落語心中 与太郎放浪篇
昭和元禄落語心中～助六再び篇～

node.description: Shinichi Omata is a Japanese director, storyboard artist, and former producer best known for directing Showa Genroku Rakugo Shinju (2016) and Kaguya-sama: Love is War (2019).

Kouji Tsujitani was a Japanese actor, voice actor, narrator, and director of audiography. Tsujitani used to be affiliated with Sigma Seven. He died of a stroke on October 17, 2018.

He was married to fellow voice actress [Kumiko Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/95248/).

Ringo Shiina is a Japanese singer, songwriter and musician. She is also the founder and frontwoman of the band Tokyo Jihen.

She describes herself as "Shinjuku-kei Jisaku-Jien-ya (新宿系自作自演屋, a Shinjuku-style writer-performer)". She was ranked number 36 in a list of Japan's top 100 musicians compiled by HMV in 2003.

Shiina is an accomplished musician and songwriter who writes music spanning numerous genres. She is well known for her eccentricity, rolling her "r"s and creating promotional music videos with striking visuals. She mainly plays rhythm guitar, but she plays other musical instruments. During live shows she sometimes plays the piano and occasionally plays the bass guitar. While recording, she sometimes plays piano and drums, and occasionally uses uncommon musical instruments such as a melodica and a shamisen.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
